items.sentence: Have you finished writing that song you\'ve been working on?
I think it\'s time for me to write my mother another letter.
I want that more than I\'ve ever wanted anything in my life.
Tom pushed me into the pool, so I got out and pushed him in.
Tom took care of Mary\'s cats while she was in the hospital.
Tom stood at the door, flipping the light switch on and off.
Tom stopped crying after his mother kissed his skinned knee.
Tom stuck his grocery list to the fridge door with a magnet.
Tom told me that he had been skydiving since he was sixteen.
Tom began to believe that he\'d never be able to walk again.
